alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lawrence; Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:18PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL LIMESTONE... SOUTHEASTERN COLBERT...NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND NORTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CST... At 718 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Littleville, or near Tuscumbia, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40-50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Muscle Shoals, Russellville, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Town Creek, Littleville, Leighton, Courtland, North Courtland, and Hillsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama.
